channel.title: Dmarc on Learn Build & Break!
channel.description: Recent content in Dmarc on Learn Build & Break!

item.title: Hey! Organisations don’t underestimate DMARC policy!
item.description: Hi friends, It has been a long time since I have written, of course I am lazy. I was desperate to find bugs in Google & Facebook ( at least one valid ) so I thought let’s start with Google services. We all know about Google Groups, it is a service that provides discussion groups for people sharing common interests. Google Groups have a nice feature to post on groups by sending emails.
